triple_sequences.object: self.api_url, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': f'Bearer {api_token}'}, json={'query': type(self).get_query(), 'variables': variables or {}}
triple_sequences.intention_description: Transmit encoded data via HTTP POST
